casebody.data:
ALLSCRIPTS HEALTHCARE, LLC
v.
ETRANSMEDIA TECHNOLOGY, INC. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2017 W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 30th day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
